VRFrameData.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The VRFrameData interface of the WebVR API represents all the information needed to render a single frame of a VR scene; constructed by .

blockquote.para: This interface was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

VRFrameDataPose.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The pose read-only property of the interface returns the of the at the current .

blockquote.para: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

VRFrameDataLeftProjectionMatrix.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The leftProjectionMatrix read-only property of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Float32Array")}} representing a 4x4 matrix that describes the projection to be used for the left eye's rendering.

blockquote.para: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: This value may be passed directly to WebGL's function.

blockquote.para: It is highly recommended that applications use this matrix without modification. Failure to use this projection matrix when rendering may cause the presented frame to be distorted or badly aligned, resulting in varying degrees of user discomfort.

VRFrameDataRightProjectionMatrix.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The rightProjectionMatrix read-only property of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Float32Array")}} representing a 4x4 matrix that describes the projection to be used for the right eye's rendering.

blockquote.para: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: This value may be passed directly to WebGL's function.

blockquote.para: It is highly recommended that applications use this matrix without modification. Failure to use this projection matrix when rendering may cause the presented frame to be distorted or badly aligned, resulting in varying degrees of user discomfort.

VRFrameDataVRFrameData.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The VRFrameData() constructor creates a object instance.

blockquote.para: This constructor was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

VRFrameDataLeftViewMatrix.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The leftViewMatrix read-only property of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Float32Array")}} representing a 4x4 matrix that describes the view transform to be used for the left eye's rendering.

blockquote.para: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: This value may be passed directly to WebGL's function.

blockquote.para: It is highly recommended that applications use this matrix when rendering.

VRFrameDataRightViewMatrix.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The rightViewMatrix read-only property of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Float32Array")}} representing a 4x4 matrix that describes the view transform to be used for the right eye's rendering.

blockquote.para: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: This value may be passed directly to WebGL's function.

blockquote.para: It is highly recommended that applications use this matrix when rendering.

VRFrameDataTimestamp.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The timestamp read-only property of the interface returns a constantly increasing timestamp value representing the time a frame update occurred.

blockquote.para: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: Timestamps are useful for determining if position state data has been updated from the hardware. Since values are monotonically increasing, they can be compared to determine the ordering of updates â€” newer values will always be greater than or equal to older values.
The timestamp starts at 0 the first time is invoked for a given .
